metadata.title: CVE-2021-43540 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: WebExtensions with the correct permissions were able to create and installServiceWorkers for third-party websites that would not have beenuninstalled with the extension. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 95.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
